title: Bloomberg Markets: Students Become Social Innovation Leaders
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Students Become Social Innovation Leaders
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUESTS:\u0010Gloria Larson\u0010President\u0010Bentley University\u0010Discussing "How Colleges and Universities are Preparing Students to Become Social Innovation Leaders" with Bentley President Gloria Larson and Jonathan White, Director for the Center of Service-Learning and Civic Engagement at Bentley. \u0010Bentley University is a strategic partner of Bloomberg Radio. \u0010\u0010Stephen Kennedy\u0010Vice President of Leadership Programs and University Relations\u0010Synchrony Financial \u0010Discussing graduates shifting focus from profit to purpose. \u0010\u0010Sam Vaghar\u0010Executive Director\u0010Millennium Campus Network\u0010Discussing connecting a generation to improve communities.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
